text: A handheld game console is a small, light, portable electronic machine for playing video games. It has a built-in screen to display the game being played. It also has game control buttons that is used to control the game, there are also speakers to hear the in-game sounds of the game being played. ==Related pages== *Video game console *Game Boy *Game Boy Color *Game Boy Advance *N-Gage *Nintendo DS *Nintendo 3DS *PlayStation Portable *PlayStation Vita
title: Handheld game console
